function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases in the workplace through shared office tools.","Impact":"Risk of infection and spread of contagious diseases among employees.","Mitigation":"Implementing regular cleaning and disinfection of shared office tools, and promoting good hand hygiene practices among employees.","Technologies":"Use of UV sterilization devices for shared office tools, and implementation of contactless technology for office equipment.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone who shares the workplace facilities and tools.","Owner":"Employers, facility managers, and health and safety officers."},{"Description":"Differing levels of hazard and exposure potential to COVID-19 in various workplace environments (e.g., hospitals and airports).","Impact":"Higher risk of exposure to COVID-19 for employees working in high-hazard environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict infection control measures, providing appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), and conducting regular testing and screening for employees.","Technologies":"Air filtration and ventilation systems, temperature screening devices, and contact tracing technology.","People":"Employees, visitors, and anyone present in high-hazard workplace environments.","Owner":"Health and safety officers, facility managers, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Application of Failure Mode and Effects Analysis (FMEA) to different workplaces for risk assessment.","Impact":"Failure to effectively identify and mitigate potential risks in workplace environments, leading to increased risk of contagious disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Conducting regular FMEA assessments, addressing identified failure modes, and implementing corrective actions to reduce risk.","Technologies":"FMEA software applications and digital risk assessment tools.","People":"Risk managers, health and safety officers, and organizational leaders responsible for risk assessment.","Owner":"Organizational leaders, health and safety officers, and risk management teams."}]}
